mapper.insert: insert into medical_archival (id, patient_id, surgery_time, start_time, illness_state, activity, process, department, hospital, doctor_name, content, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{surgeryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{illnessState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{process,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{department,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hospital,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
